caption: cyRespond to a property possession claim
heading: cyPayments or agreements since the claim was made
paragraph1: cyYou will now be asked questions about any payments or agreements you have made since Treetop Housing made their claim.
paragraph2: cyThis will help a judge understand:
paragraph3: cyThe claimant will be able to see your answers.
paragraph4: cyIf you paid some or all of the money you owe, you should bring proof of this to the hearing
bullet1: cyIf any arrangements have already been made to pay off the money you owe in rent payments (rent arrears)
bullet2: cyIf you've paid some or all of the money you owe
